deprecated.notes: As of Titanium 9.0.0, building Windows apps is no longer supported.

methods.name: registerPushNotificationTask
methods.summary: Register a push notification event that triggers a background task to run.
methods.description: Provides a way to register PushNotificationTrigger that runs in background that is invoked along with push notification.

parameters.name: entryPoint
parameters.summary: Callback C++/CX class name that is invoked on time event. Callback class should implement Windows::ApplicationModel::Background::IBackgroundTask.

methods.name: registerTimerTask
methods.summary: Register a time event that triggers a background task to run.
methods.description: Provides a way to register TimeTrigger that runs in background that is invoked with specific time interval.

parameters.name: entryPoint
parameters.summary: Callback C++/CX class name that is invoked on time event. Callback class should implement Windows::ApplicationModel::Background::IBackgroundTask.

parameters.name: freshnessTime
parameters.summary: Interval of a time event in minutes. Windows requires at least 15 minutes.

parameters.name: oneShot
parameters.summary: Sets whether the time event trigger will be used only once or each time the FreshnessTime interval elapses.

methods.name: unregisterAllTasks
methods.summary: Unregisters all registered background task associated with this application.

methods.name: unregisterTask
methods.summary: Unregisters registered background task associated with this application.

parameters.name: task
parameters.summary: Task id as number, or BackgroundServiceTask object to unregister.
